info.title: Data247
info.description: Data247.com Connector to use our APIs for Data Validation, Fraud Detection, Verification of Customer Data etc.

200.description: Text retrieves the Carrier name, iswireless, email-to-SMS, and email-to-MMS gateway addresses for your wireless phone numbers.
Success

get.description: Text retrieves the Carrier name, iswireless, email-to-SMS, and email-to-MMS gateway addresses for your wireless phone numbers.

200.description: Carrier247 (USA) returns Carrier name, iswireless, email-to-SMS, and email-to-MMS gateway addresses for provided domestic US phone numbers.
Success

get.description: Carrier247 (USA) returns Carrier name, iswireless, email-to-SMS, and email-to-MMS gateway addresses for provided domestic US phone numbers.

200.description: Carrier247 (Carrier Type) is similar to Carrier247 (USA), but only returns a subset of the data (just the carrier type), and it works for Canadian phone numbers as well as USA without the requirement that the user subscribe to the CLNPC to get port corrected results.
Success

get.description: Carrier247 (Carrier Type) is similar to Carrier247 (USA), but only returns a subset of the data (just the carrier type), and it works for Canadian phone numbers as well as USA without the requirement that the user subscribe to the CLNPC to get port corrected results.

200.description: Carrier247 (International) returns carrier information for international phone numbers, including whether they are wireless or landline numbers.
Success

get.description: Carrier247 (International)returns carrier information for international phone numbers, including whether they are wireless or landline numbers.

200.description: Verify247 (Email) will verify that each of your email address is properly formatted and there is a working mailbox associated with it.
Success

get.description: Verify247 (Email) will verify that each of your email address is properly formatted and there is a working mailbox associated with it.

200.description: Verify247 (Postal Address) verifies provided USA postal addresses and parses out to different address components.
Success

get.description: Verify247 (Postal Address) verifies provided USA postal addresses and parses out to different address components.

200.description: Verify247 (Phone Number) will verify that each of the provided phone is active or not.
Success

get.description: Verify247 (Phone Number) will verify that each of the provided phone is active or not.

200.description: Append247 (Phone) appends phone number for your contacts. You supply names and addresses of your contacts, and api will return their phone.
Success

get.description: Append247 (Phone) appends phone number for your contacts. You supply names and addresses of your contacts, and api will return their phone.

200.description: Append247 (Email) appends email addresses for your contacts. You supply names and addresses or their phone numbers, and api will return their email addresses.
Success

get.description: Append247 (Email) appends email addresses for your contacts. You supply names and addresses or their phone numbers, and api will return their email addresses.

200.description: Append247 (Reverse Phone) finds the name and address associated with a phone number.
Success

get.description: Append247 (Reverse Phone) finds the name and address associated with a phone number.

200.description: Append247 (Reverse Phone) finds the name and address associated with a phone number.
Success

get.description: Append247 (Reverse Phone) finds the name and address associated with a phone number.

200.description: Our Append247 (Profile Data) service gives you additional information about the people on your lead list, including Financial, Interests, and/or Household data.
Success

get.description: Our Append247 (Profile Data) service gives you additional information about the people on your lead list, including Financial, Interests, and/or Household data.

200.description: Append247 (Name) takes phone as input and returns name of person behind it.
Success

get.description: Append247 (Name) takes phone as input and returns name of person behind it.

200.description: Append247 (Gender) returns the probable gender associated with a name.
Success

get.description: Append247 (Gender) returns the probable gender associated with a name.

200.description: Append247 (Zipcode) appends 9-digit zipcodes for your contacts. You supply the addresses, and the api will return their zip code and other information.
Success

get.description: Append247 (Zipcode) appends 9-digit zipcodes for your contacts. You supply the addresses, and the api will return their zip code and other information.

200.description: Append247 (Reverse Zipcode) takes a 5 or 9 digit zipcode, and returns the formatted address components(address, city, state etc) of that location.
Success

get.description: Append247 (Reverse Zipcode) takes a 5 or 9 digit zipcode, and returns the formatted address components(address, city, state etc) of that location.

200.description: Locate247 (IP) returns the geolocation data for IP addresses.
Success

get.description: Locate247 (IP) returns the geolocation data for IP addresses.

200.description: DNC Check returns whether a phone number exists in your internal dnc list OR in Federal Do-Not-Call list. In order to use Federal Do-Not-Call service, you need to open an account with us and then go to https://telemarketing.donotcall.gov (the FTC's National Do Not Call Registry) and register with them.
Success

get.description: DNC Check returns whether a phone number exists in your internal dnc list OR in Federal Do-Not-Call list. In order to use Federal Do-Not-Call service, you need to open an account with us and then go to https://telemarketing.donotcall.gov (the FTC's National Do Not Call Registry) and register with them.

200.description: Trust247 (Phone Number) takes phone number as input and returns whether it's on a list of SPAM callers.
Success

get.description: Trust247 (Phone Number) takes phone number as input and returns whether it's on a list of SPAM callers.
